Push Protocol | Previously EPNS:‚ÄÇDear EPNS community, friends, & builders üîî
Today we have an exciting announcement. EPNS is rebranding to Push Protocol!

(1/10)

articles.description:
RT‚ÄÇAccelchain
Re For example:
@developer_dao is a DAO whose affiliation is mainly taken by developers in the web3 space. 
How to get into the DAO?
Get the governance token of the DAO. In this case the governance token of Developer Dao is $code. 
Voila, you can now take part in their projects.

articles.description: Re Biconomy is a multichain relayer protocol founded by @AraBalaghi @@aniket_jindal08 @schin_tomar. Their mission is to improve the user onboarding and transaction experience on dapps by making them as intuitive and easy to use as web2 products.

RT‚ÄÇnader (üß±, üöÄ) | nader.lens | nader.arweave.dev
Wanted to learn how to implement gasless transactions, only found broken docs & a 50 minute tutorial
Decided to put together a basic example using a @biconomy relayer + ERC2771Context Meta Transactions
Ended up being pretty simple, open sourced it here:‚ÄÇhttps://github.com/dabit3/gasless-transactions-example
